dcterms:creator: Y. Hitomi
J. Gu
M. Gupta
T. Mitsunaga
S. K. Nayar
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for video compressed sensing, allowing the reconstruction of video from a single coded exposure photograph using a learned over-complete dictionary.
dcterms:title: Video Compressed Sensing

dcterms:creator: A. A. Moghadam
M. Aghagolzadeh
M. Kumar
H. Radha
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a compressive framework for demosaicing of natural images, addressing the challenge of recovering full color images from incomplete data.
dcterms:title: Color Image Demosaicing

dcterms:creator: D. Reddy
A. Veeraraghavan
R. Chellappa
dcterms:description: P2C2 is a programmable pixel compressive camera designed for high-speed imaging, enabling the capture of fast-moving scenes.
dcterms:title: P2C2 (Programmable Pixel Compressive Camera)

dcterms:creator: T. T. Cai
L. Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on orthogonal matching pursuit for sparse signal recovery in the presence of noise, providing a framework for basis pursuit recovery.
dcterms:title: Basis Pursuit Recovery

dcterms:creator: A. Veeraraghavan
D. Reddy
R. Raskar
dcterms:description: Coded strobing photography utilizes compressive sensing techniques to capture high-speed periodic videos, enabling the analysis of fast motion.
dcterms:title: Coded Strobing Photography

dcterms:creator: C. Studer
R. Baraniuk
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a framework for stable restoration and separation of approximately sparse signals, contributing to the field of compressed sensing.
dcterms:title: Compressed Sensing Framework

dcterms:creator: W. R. Carson
M. Chen
M. R. D. Rodrigues
R. Calderbank
L. Carin
dcterms:description: This dataset explores communications-inspired projection design with applications to compressive sensing, enhancing the understanding of projection techniques.
dcterms:title: Compressive Sensing Techniques

dcterms:creator: R. Malvar
L. Wei He
R. Cutler
dcterms:description: This dataset presents high-quality linear interpolation techniques for demosaicing Bayer-patterned color images, improving color image reconstruction.
dcterms:title: Demosaicing Techniques
